Translations.Text: sum te'one temani budhdhi avum ja sikhavade che athava to a ja loko balavakhora che
sum a loko kahe che ke a payagambare (kura'ana) pote ghadi kadhyum che? Vata evi che ke te imana nathi lavata
ham! Jo a loko sacca hoya to ana jevi eka (ja) vata to la'i ave
sum a loko ko'i sarjana karanara vagara jate ja peda tha'i gaya che? Athava to a pote sarjana karanara che
sum temane ja akasa ane dharatine peda karya che? Parantu a yakina na karavavala'o che
Athava sum temani pase tara palanaharana khajana che? Athava (te khajanana) dekharekha rakhanara che
athava to sum temani pase ko'i sidi che jena para cadhine avya che? (Jo avum ja che) to temano ko'i sambhalanara khulli dalila ape
sum allaha mate to putri'o che? Ane tamara tyam putro che
sum tame te lokothi ko'i mahenatanu iccho cho? Jethi a loko tena bharathi dabayela hoya
sum te loko pase adrasyanum jnana che? Jene te'o lakhi rahya hoya
sum a loko ko'i cala ramava icche che? Tame nisrcita tha'i java cala calanara (loko) inkari'o che
sum allaha sivaya te'ono ko'i ma'abuda (sacco pujya) che? (Kadapi nahim) allaha ta'ala te'ona bhagidaro theravavathi pavitra che
jo a loko akasana ko'i tukadane (dharati para) padato jo'i le, to pana ama ja kahese ke a to eka pachi eka vadala che
tame te'one chodi do, tyam sudhi ke te'o te divasane jo'i le je divase te'o behosa kari nakhavamam avase
je divase te'one temani cala ko'i kama nahim ave ane na to temane madada karavamam avase
ni:Sanka atyacari'o mate a sivaya biji ghani yatana'o pana che. Parantu te lokomam vadhare loko abhana che
tame potana palanaharana adesani pratiksamam dhairya vade kama lo, ni:Sanka tame amari ankho same savare jyare na utho potana palanaharani pavitrata ane prasansa bayana karo
ane ratre pana tena namanum smarana karo ane tara'o athamavana samaye pana
